G-H color) set in a pav√© setting. Adorned with two pear-shaped

features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate floral cascade design. The necklace features two prominent pendants, each intricately designed with floral motifs and embellished with diamonds. The focal point of each pendant is a vibrant ruby cabochon. The necklace chain is seamlessly integrated with the floral design, creating a harmonious and elegant look.The open work design is both timeless and adds a modern touch.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamond) with a striking contrast from the deep red rubies (Manikyam).
occasions: and special occasions. A statement piece for brides during Muhurtham or for any festive event.
description: This haaram blends traditional South Indian design with modern jewelry techniques. The high-quality diamonds and rubies, combined with the intricate floral design, create a truly stunning piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance. A valuable investment and a timeless heirloom to be cherished for generations.
